Package com.qoretechnologies.qorus.workflow

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicDataHelper
    Java wrapper for the OMQ::UserApi::Workflow::DynamicDataHelper "DynamicDataHelper" class in Qorus This class is a helper class that allows dynamicdata "workflow dynamic data" to be read and updated atomically; the write lock for the data is grabbed in the constructor and released in the destructor Calls to the following workflow API functions related to dynamicdata "workflow dynamic data" can be made normally while this object exists and the write lock is held; the functions are aware of and automatically use the write lock held by this object: WorkflowApi.deleteDynamicDataKey() WorkflowApi.getDynamicData() WorkflowApi.updateDynamicData() The %Qore-language destructor is run at the end of the Java step execution, after the step returns to Qorus.
    QorusAsyncArrayStep
    The abstract class for asyncsteps "async array steps" Example
    QorusAsyncStep
    The Java interface class for asyncsteps "asynchronous steps" An asynchronous step should be used any time a workflow action should be executed and it's not known in advance how long the action could take, or if the action should take a long period of time.
    QorusAsyncStepBase
    The Java base interface class for asyncsteps "asynchronous steps"
    QorusEventArrayStep
    The Java interface class for eventsteps "workflow synchronization event array steps" Workflow synchronization event steps allow many workflow orders to synchronize their processing based on a single event.
    QorusEventStep
    The Java interface class for eventsteps "workflow synchronization event steps" Workflow synchronization event steps allow many workflow orders to synchronize their processing based on a single event.
    QorusEventStepBase
    The Java base interface class for eventsteps "event steps"
    QorusNormalArrayStep
    The abstract class for normalsteps "normal array steps" Example
    QorusNormalStep
    The abstract class for normalsteps "normal steps" Example
    QorusStepBase
    Base class for workflow step classes
    QorusSubworkflowArrayStep
    The abstract class for subworkflowsteps "subworkflow array steps" A subworkflow step binds a child workflow (called a subworkflow) to a step and should be used to implement support for complex logical branching in Qorus.
    QorusSubworkflowStep
    The abstract class for subworkflowsteps "subworkflow steps" A subworkflow step binds a child workflow (called a subworkflow) to a step and should be used to implement support for complex logical branching in Qorus.
    QorusSubworkflowStepBase
    The Java base interface class for subworkflowsteps "subworkflow steps"
    QorusWorkflow
    Base class for workflow classes
    SensitiveDataHelper
    Java wrapper for the OMQ::UserApi::Workflow::SensitiveDataHelper "SensitiveDataHelper" class in Qorus This class is a helper class that allows sensitive_data "workflow sensitive data" to be read and updated atomically; the write lock for the data is grabbed in the constructor and released in the destructor Calls to the following workflow API functions related to sensitive_data "sensitive data" can be made normally while this object exists and the write lock is held; the functions are aware of and automatically use the write lock held by this object: WorkflowApi.deleteSensitiveDataKey() WorkflowApi.getSensitiveData() WorkflowApi.updateSensitiveData() The %Qore-language destructor is run at the end of the Java step execution, after the step returns to Qorus.
    StepDataHelper
    Java wrapper for the OMQ::UserApi::Workflow::StepDataHelper "StepDataHelper" class in Qorus This class is a helper class that allows stepdata "workflow dynamic step data" to be read and updated atomically; the write lock for the data is grabbed in the constructor and released in the destructor Calls to the following workflow API functions related to stepdata "workflow dynamic data" can be made normally while this object exists and the write lock is held; the functions are aware of and automatically use the write lock held by this object: QorusStepBase.deleteStepDataKey() QorusStepBase.getStepData() QorusStepBase.updateStepData() The %Qore-language destructor is run at the end of the Java step execution, after the step returns to Qorus.
    TempDataHelper
    Java wrapper for the OMQ::UserApi::Workflow::TempDataHelper "TempDataHelper" class in Qorus This class is a helper class that allows tempdata "workflow temp data" to be read and updated atomically; the write lock for the data is grabbed in the constructor and released in the destructor.
    WorkflowApi
    The main Qorus Java workflow API class
    WorkflowDataHelper
    Java wrapper for the OMQ::UserApi::Workflow::WorkflowDataHelper "WorkflowDataHelper" class in Qorus This class is a helper class that allows dynamicdata "workflow dynamic data" (DynamicDataHelper) and tempdata "workflow temp data" (TempDataHelper) to be read and updated atomically; the write lock for the data is grabbed in the constructor and released in the destructor.
